comment: from calling you "sir" in the BTP to calling you "Bhaiya",  you have evolved from being a TA to a friendly mentor who always guided me. I really enjoyed working under you and the parties we had in the lab.

comment: Khamma Ghani. U r one of the most hardworking and pure-hearted insan I have ever met. You made the campus not just bearable but truly enjoyable. Will miss having u as a friend, brother, junior, counsellor, coach, & so much more. Ur 'harmless' pranks will be missed. All the best for the new journey.

comment: Ashu, you're the most supportive person I've ever had, like a brother to me, whom I trust completely and always turn to in times of need. "In a field of countless stars, my Ashu shines brightest, a cherished confidant and a trusted ally.". All the best for your future.

comment: Hey bro/partner in crime! Life has been easier here thanks to your overloaded sweetness. Never can I expect any waiter to say "bhaiya ab kal ana khane" unless you're there üòÇ. Thanks for all the beautiful memories roomie. You deserve the best, never settle for less.
